name: Magic Mushrooms (C64)
description:
Magic Mushrooms (C64) Commodore 64

Magic Mushrooms is a new, recent Commodore game from 2021 based on a old obscure mag type-in game. Alas, a re/dux version, re-coded with 'new occult features' and style. It takes snakes, I mean worms to a whole new cosmic level.
